DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between D & C Hysteroscopy Management AUB Perimenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: Perimenopausal woman complain abnormal uterine bleeding select assessment detailed history taking , general abdominal examination , local gynecological examination , transvaginal sonography ( TVS ) scan routine blood investigation . Eligible participant study complain menorrhagia , metrorrhagia , polymenorrhoea polymenorrhagia without local gynecological cause failure medical treatment least 3 month . All woman participate study randomly allocate two group ; dilatation curettage ( D & C ) group hysteroscopy group . For woman D & C group , cervical dilatation fractional endometrial curettage do total intravenous ( IV ) anesthesia operation theater curetting send histopathological examination . For woman hysteroscopy group , hysteroscopy do total IV anesthesia operation theater hysteroscopic-guided curettings also take sent histopathological examination .
DOC.criteria: Perimenopausal woman complain abnormal uterine bleeding ( menorrhagia , metrorrhagia , polymenorrhoea polymenorrhagia ) without local gynecological cause . Failure medical treatment least 3 month . Age < 45 > 55 year . Blood disorder coagulopathy . Diagnosed suspected local gynecologic lesion ( polyp , adenomyosis , myoma , malignancy cervical pathology ) . Use intrauterine contraceptive device . Pregnancy related condition .
